CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 做；干；办某事；提供；供应；执行；照料；处理；使出；用出；写（书等）；作（曲、画等）；引起；产生；学习；从事（职业）；适合；给予；给；演出；编排（戏剧、歌剧等）；犯（罪）；欺骗；骗取；服（刑期）；使整洁；烹调；<俚>性交；使疲乏；行过；走过（一段路程）
用于实义动词前构成否定句和疑问句；构成附加疑问句；代替实义动词以避免重复
要求；规定；社交聚会；社交活动；聚会；舞会；<口>活动；事件；C大调音阶中的第一音；<口>必须做到的事情
（DO）防御命令（Defense Order的缩写）；验光学博士（Doctor of Optometry的缩写）；疗骨学博士（Doctor of Osteopathy的缩写）

synonym.mean: 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指需专门技术熟练技巧去完成某种复杂的任务或表演等，也指用行动把计划或打算付诸实施或执行某项命令。
和perform一样比较正式，二者意义相近，但conduct含指导、领导或监督等意味。
最普通常用词，指完成某项具体工作、任务，也指完成某种行为或动作。
指完成困难较大、较复杂的任务。较正式用词。
指履行和实现所许诺的、所期望或要求的事情，含最终完成的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 宁愿做；更喜欢做；更愿意做
未能做, 未能做成, 失败
想要做某事；希望做某事；愿意做某事

list.abstract: do 是用于一般现在时的助动词,did 则是用于一般过去时的助动词。do还有实义动词（有实在意义的动词）的解释：做，干。口语中,do 的否定式通常用缩合形式。例如,do not 略作 don't,did not 略作 didn't。
溶解在水中的空气中的分子态氧称为溶解氧，水中的溶解氧的含量与空气中氧的分压、水的温度都有密切关系。在自然情况下，空气中的含氧量变动不大，故水温是主要的因素，水温愈低，水中溶解氧的含量愈高。溶解于水中的分子态氧称为溶解氧，通常记作DO，用每升水里氧气的毫克数表示。水中溶解氧的多少是衡量水体自净能力的一个指标。

yingyinNormal.en: Farkle, do whatever you do with that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗科，该怎么做就怎么做吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't do that! He says he can't do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能这样做！他说他不能那样做。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't do that. I couldn't possibly do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能这么做，我不可能这么做。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you propose to do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你打算怎么做?

yingyinNormal.en: What do you want me to do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 想让我做什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Yes, do this, do that. No, thank you, goodbye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人吗？是的，做这个，做那个。不用了，谢谢，再见。

yingyinNormal.en: How do we do that? With cameras.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要怎么做？用摄像头。

yingyinNormal.en: What do they do? My dad's a writer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做什么的？我爸是个作家。

yingyinNormal.en: This I will not do! This I will never do!
yingyinNormal.zh: 免谈，我绝不那么做！

yingyinNormal.en: By who? Do you think they'd do it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁黑的，你觉得他们会这么做吗？

yingyinNormal.en: No I can't do that, Brian. No, I can't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我做不到，布莱恩，我做不到。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. What do you want me to do? Smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，那你让我怎么做？笑。

yingyinNormal.en: And how do we do that? Let me find him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这要怎么做呢？我去找到他。

yingyinNormal.en: So do them for free.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你就做啊。

yingyinNormal.en: So what do you do? I'm a masseuse by day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是做哪一行的？我平常是按摩师。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, sir, what exactly do we need to do here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，现在我们到底能做什么？

yingyinNormal.en: The thing we never do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从没做过的。

yingyinNormal.en: You can do that? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你做得到吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, what should I do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我应该怎么做？

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. What did I do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。我哪里做错了？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

exam_freq_info.chinese: 完成; 做完; 结束
从事(工作); 执行(任务)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 再做；重做；重新装饰；重新油漆；重新粉刷
adj. 过于自信的；自负的
v. 把…做得过分；表演过火；过于夸张；过分使用；使过分劳累；使筋疲力尽；把…烘烤（或蒸煮）过度
n. 做某事的人；实干家；硬汉子
adj. 解开的；松开的；未做的；未完成的；毁了的；丢脸的
v. 解开；打开；松开；消除…影响或结果；使恢复原状；使垮台；毁灭；恢复；取消

word_family.mean: v. 做；实现；完成；行动；行事；合适的；可接受的；痛打；杀死；起诉；宣告…有罪

sense_info_list.en: Do can be used to stand for any verb group, or to refer back to another verb group, including one that was in a previous sentence.

examination_example.sentence: The unpaid housework <highlight>done</highlight> by women is triple that <highlight>done</highlight> by men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女性无偿做的家务是男性的三倍。

examination_example.sentence: I've never <highlight>done</highlight> it before and I know that you've been doing it for ages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以前从没做过，但我知道你做了很长时间了。

examination_example.sentence: However, he points out that many countries have not <highlight>done</highlight> so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，他指出，许多国家还没有这样做。

sense_info_list.zh: 完成; 做完; 结束

examination_example.sentence: Once he's all <highlight>done</highlight>, the work will remain there permanently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦他完成了所有的工作，作品将永远留在那里。

examination_example.sentence: Finally I'll be <highlight>done</highlight> with my studies and could go on to earning loads of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我将完成我的学业，继续赚很多钱。

examination_example.sentence: Once you are <highlight>done</highlight> demonstrating whatever concept was in the textbook, you throw away the pipe cleaners, the cardboard tubes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你完成了教科书中概念的演示，你就会把吸管和硬纸筒道具扔掉。

sense_info_list.en: When you do something, you take some action or perform an activity or task.
sense_info_list.zh: 从事(工作); 执行(任务)

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman have to do while the paint job is being <highlight>done</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 油漆工作进行时，女士需要做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Some of the surveys included only college students; others were <highlight>done</highlight> with a mixed-age population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些调查只包括大学生; 另一些调查则是针对混合年龄人群进行的。

sense_info_list.en: If you say that someone or something does well or badly, you are talking about how successful or unsuccessful they are.

examination_example.sentence: The company's self-driving cars have <highlight>done</highlight> well over a million miles across various states in the U. S.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司的自动驾驶汽车已经在美国多个州行驶了100多万英里。

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>done</highlight> better than conventional cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们比传统汽车做得更好。

sense_info_list.en: To do away with something means to remove it completely or put an end to it.

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>done</highlight> away with many of the traditional ways of thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它摒弃了许多传统的思维方式。

examination_example.sentence: Once the fires were over, the family had to fix the damage <highlight>done</highlight> to the farm, as it was such a large property.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 火灾一结束，这家人就得修复对农场造成的破坏，因为它是一笔如此巨大的财产。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 放在主语前构成疑问句
收拾; 擦; 洗;  梳; 煮

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 宁愿做；更喜欢做；更愿意做

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 解开；打开；松开；消除…影响或结果；使恢复原状；使垮台；毁灭；恢复；取消

word_family.mean: v. 做；实现；完成；行动；行事；合适的；可接受的；痛打；杀死；起诉；宣告…有罪

sense_info_list.zh: 放在主语前构成疑问句

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>do</highlight> most people think is very important in spoken communication?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人认为在口语交际中什么是非常重要的？

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>did</highlight> the author manage to finish her novel?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者是如何设法完成她的小说的？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Do</highlight> you think it's possible for us to talk sometime today?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为我们今天有可能找个时间谈谈吗？

examination_example.sentence: For Pruitt, a keen bicyclist, the first thing to <highlight>do</highlight> was replace his stolen bike.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于热衷于骑自行车的Pruitt来说，要做的第一件事就是更换掉他被偷的自行车。

examination_example.sentence: What does the man ask the woman to <highlight>do</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男人要求女人做什么？

examination_example.sentence: My brother, of course, raced off to be with his friends, while I had plenty to <highlight>do</highlight> myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，我哥哥跑去和他的朋友们待在一起，而我自己有很多事情要做。

sense_info_list.zh: 收拾; 擦; 洗;  梳; 煮

exam_freq_info.chinese: 放在实义动词前协助构成疑问句
制作, 生产, 创作
用于构成一般疑问句的答语
代替陈述句中出现过的动词
代替已经出现过的动词

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 把…做得过分；表演过火；过于夸张；过分使用；使过分劳累；使筋疲力尽；把…烘烤（或蒸煮）过度
v. 解开；打开；松开；消除…影响或结果；使恢复原状；使垮台；毁灭；恢复；取消
adj. 权利范围内的；可行的

word_family.mean: v. 做；实现；完成；行动；行事；合适的；可接受的；痛打；杀死；起诉；宣告…有罪

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 想要做某事；希望做某事；愿意做某事
拒绝做；拒绝从事；拒绝执行
劝告某人做某事；建议某人做某事
做杂务；做家务；干家务活
做作业；做功课；做家庭作业
做家务；做家务活；做家务事
期待某人做某事；期望某人做某事
希望做；希望做到；期望做
让某人做某事；使某人干某事
尽力做某事；努力做某事；试着做某事

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: make a decision to do sth.

examination_example.sentence: If you don't know what your friends are <highlight>doing</highlight>, will you get anxious (焦虑的) ?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不知道你的朋友在做什么，你会焦虑吗？

examination_example.sentence: In fact, very often, children don’t sit nicely and think about what they’ve <highlight>done</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，很多时候，孩子们不会坐得好，想想他们做了什么。

sense_info_list.zh: 放在实义动词前协助构成疑问句

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>does</highlight> China help poor people to fight poverty?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国如何帮助贫困人口战胜贫困？

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>did</highlight> Mrs. Jacobs want Simon to do in class?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雅各布斯太太想让西蒙在课堂上做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Why <highlight>do</highlight> you mention him?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么提到他？

examination_example.sentence: Instead, it keeps your mind focused and you'll be able to get more <highlight>done</highlight> quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，它让你的思想集中，你将能够更快地完成更多工作。

examination_example.sentence: It gave him TV and game time with his work all <highlight>done</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这给了他电视和游戏时间，他的工作都完成了。

examination_example.sentence: You'll begin each new day with a head start, already knowing what needs to be <highlight>done</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您将以良好的开端开始新的一天，已经知道需要做什么。

sense_info_list.zh: 制作, 生产, 创作

examination_example.sentence: What can you learn from <highlight>doing</highlight> housework?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能从做家务中学到什么？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Doing</highlight> some housework together with her is another good way for you two to know each other better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和她一起做家务，是你们俩更了解对方的另一个好办法。

examination_example.sentence: Tony was drawing a picture while I was <highlight>doing</highlight> my homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托尼在我做功课的时候正在画一幅画。

examination_example.sentence: Mr Black walked around and offered help while we were <highlight>doing</highlight> an experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布莱克先生走来走去，在我们做实验时提供帮助。

sense_info_list.zh: 用于构成一般疑问句的答语

examination_example.sentence: Yes, I <highlight>did</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，我做到了。

examination_example.sentence: Some thought the company <highlight>did</highlight> not care for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人认为公司不关心他们。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>did</highlight> not drink!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我没有喝酒！

examination_example.sentence: Everyone can <highlight>do</highlight> something to make a difference to a community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都可以做些什么来改变社区。

sense_info_list.zh: 代替陈述句中出现过的动词

examination_example.sentence: He takes my grades as seriously as my teachers <highlight>do</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他像我的老师一样认真对待我的成绩。

sense_info_list.zh: 代替已经出现过的动词

examination_example.sentence: I can't stand the sight of blood, so I could never do what he <highlight>does</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我受不了血的景象，所以我永远做不了他所做的事！

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>did</highlight> need a rest in bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她确实需要上床休息。
